name: explorer-kit
effect: Sends the trainer to the Underground. Only usable outside.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
